error.accountNumberSame: Confirm Account Number should be same as Account Number
error.routingNumberLength: Routing Number must be of 9 digits
error.bankNameLength: Bank Name must be less than 159 characters.
error.validPhoneNumber: Phone Number should be of 10 digits

remittance.deliveryMode: Please select one remittance delivery mode

message.successfulAlternatePaymentMethod: You have successfully updated your secondary payment method.
message.successfulDeletePaymentMethod: You have successfully deleted your secondary payment method.
message.successfulPreferredPaymentMethod: Your payment preference is updated successfully. Payment will be released to your {{paymentMethodName}} account. It will take less than an hour for the payment to appear.
message.achAlternatePaymentMethod: Bank Deposit has been added as your Secondary Payment Method.
message.checkAlternatePaymentMethod: Check has been added as your Secondary Payment Method.
message.successfulCheckPreferredPaymentUpdate: Your payment preference is updated successfully. Payment will be released through {{paymentMethodName}}. It will take {{timeSpan}} business days to reach on your registered address.
message.successfulACHPreferredPaymentUpdate: Your payment preference is updated successfully. Payment will be released to your bank account. It will take {{timeSpan}} business days for the payment to appear in your bank account.
message.logoutAlternatePayment: You can add the Alternate Payment after logging in to the Payment Exchange
message.addNewAlternatePaymentMethod: Choosing a secondary payment method is recommended to ensure the smooth processing of high dollar payments. By selecting a secondary payment method, you will receive your money without delay even if it cannot be processed by your primary payment method due to network processing limits.

heading.checkAsPayment: If you prefer to receive your payment via check.

content.note: Note: Bank Deposit payment details are already added as your alternate Payment method. Same will be saved as your Preferred Payment Method. And change made for Bank Deposit will be reflected in Alternate payment method as well.

Note: Check payment details are already added as your alternate Payment method. Same will be saved as your Preferred Payment Method. And change made for Check will be reflected in Alternate payment method as well.

error.validCardNumber: Please enter a valid Card Number
error.cvvLength: CVV should be of 3 digits length

error.phoneNumberLength: Phone Number should be of 10 digits

ifEnrolled: Less than 1 Hour if Phone number or Email is enrolled with Zelle.
selectAnAccount: Please select an account to share
shareAccount: Select an account to share with

subHeading.ach: Faster, easier, & more convenient. Control the account at your own convenience.
subHeading.paypal: Payment will be released to your PayPal account. It will take less than an hour for the payment to appear.
subHeading.zelle: Quick, secure, and easy way to receive money. No need to share your confidential bank information.
subHeading.check: Allow 10-15 business days for your check to arrive to your registered address.
subHeading.directDeposit: Payment will be released to the account linked to your 16-digit Debit Card or preloadable prepaid card. It will take less than an hour for the payment to appear in your bank account.

tooltipText.paypal: PayPal threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.
tooltipText.directDeposit: Instant Pay threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.
tooltipText.zelle: Zelle threshold limit is ${{threshold}}. Any of your future payments which exceed Network Processing limit will not be processed.
